= Microsoft Help HLP files

The `.HLP` files in this directory are obtained from the MASM32 SDK at:
http://www.carabez.com/downloads.html

The files here are in particular extracted from the
"Latest MASM32 working development tool ver 9.0 ServicePack 2"
http://www.carabez.com/downloads/m32v9sp2.zip[m32v9sp2.zip] package published
on 2006-12-28.

The file is licensed under the MASM32 SDK license, which can be found
at https://www.masm32.com/licence.htm.
